CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Member_of_International_Network__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Member_of_National_Network__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Member_of_SubNational_Network__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Member_of_International_Coalition__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Member_of_National_Coalition__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Member_of_SubNational_Coalition__c , "Yes") ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked if the Grantee is a member of a coalition or a network (at any level).
CustomField.label: Member of Net or Coal
